plot: Grandpa is in a rush to paint his future granddaughter's nursery pink. He hits a snag when the paintbrush he purchased only paints orange, the same as paintbrush's girlfriend, who was left behind at the store.
title: Painted Love
plot_es: Grandpa is in a rush to paint his future granddaughter's nursery pink. He hits a snag when the paintbrush he purchased only paints orange, the same as paintbrush's girlfriend, who was left behind at the store.
plot_en: Grandpa is in a rush to paint his future granddaughter's nursery pink. He hits a snag when the paintbrush he purchased only paints orange, the same as paintbrush's girlfriend, who was left behind at the store.
